code: import React from'react';import classes from'./Modal.module.scss';import Input from'../input/Input';import Button from'../button/Button';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Modal=_ref=>{let{children,handleShow,name,handleInput,handleAdd}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.wrapper}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.content,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:'Закрыть',action:()=>handleShow(name)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{placeholder:'введите текст',action:handleInput}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:'Добавить',action:handleAdd}),children]})]});};export default Modal;
